hello.text: I am the strongest ! But I still need a doctor once in a while...

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: I don't know what to say. I've never experienced something like this.

how.name: What do you mean ?
how.text: I can't stop sneezing but it's not because of the flowers. I froze most I could find.

what.name: What happened recently ?
what.text: I have been playing quite a lot. Freezing frogs, fairies, humans even.

what.name: Nothing else ?
what.text: Then Letty came up and we began using our powers together. Maybe that was a bit too much, we froze most of the lake.

check.name: Checkout her skin.
check.text: {i}As you touch her, you get frozen.{s}

scanner.name: Use the lunarian scanner.
scanner.text: {i}Looks like ice crystals are forming inside her body.{s}

temperature.name: Take her temperature.
temperature.text: {i}She is cold. Actually, surprisingly cold, even for an ice fairy !{s}

painkillers.name: Give her painkillers.
painkillers.text: {i}Pretty bad idea. She begins shivering and collapses.{s}

medicine.name: Give her some hot cocoa.
medicine.text: {i}Her temperature stabilizes. Looks like it was a good idea !{s}

medicine.name: Give her some medicine
medicine.text: {i}You don't really know what to give her so you try a placebo. It's not very effective...{s}
